attributes.action: Create an Nctx bus route from Nottingham Centre to Keyworth.
attributes.additional_details: Transport from Keyworth to Nottingham centre has been extremely unreliable and the service to customers has been below standards this has been consistent. Replacement of Trentbarton’s bus route to Keyworth with an Nctx bus route would be much more convenient as they’re consistent with good service and reliable punctuality.
attributes.background: I’d like to see public transport be heavily reviewed or replaced on the route from Keyworth to Nottingham centre.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about local bus routes are a matter for bus operators and the relevant local authority, not the UK Government or Parliament.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them, by entering your post code here:
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
